title: S17 Ep21: You Only Die Thrice w/ Rev. Peter Panagore
itunes:title: You Only Die Thrice w/ Rev. Peter Panagore
description:
Darkness Radio presents: You Only Die Thrice with Reverend Peter Panagore!

When Peter Panagore was young, he went ice climbing with his partnerin Alberta, Canada. On their descent, they became trapped on the mountain, and Peter died on the side of that mountain!  It was there that he had an overpowering experience with Spirit! Peter describes that experience, both the physical, and spiritual... then describes what it was like, THE 2ND TIME IT HAPPENED!! 

Check out Peter's website for his books and counseling sessions here:   https://www.peterpanagore.love/
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
